member.name: T:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.ClientScripts.BootstrapClientScriptHelper
member.summary: Helper for registering Bootstrap Client Scripts.

member.name: F:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.ClientScripts.BootstrapClientScriptHelper.RegisterBootstrapScriptResourceMappingMethodName
member.summary: Used for PreApplicationStartMethod attribute in StartUp.cs. To have hardcoded string with method name near method.

member.name: F:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.ClientScripts.BootstrapClientScriptHelper.WebUIValidationExtensionScriptResourceMappingName
member.summary: Script Resource Definition name for WebUIValidationExtension.js.

member.name: F:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.ClientScripts.BootstrapClientScriptHelper.TabPanelExtensionScriptResourceMappingName
member.summary: Script Resource Definition name for TabPanelExtension.js.

member.name: F:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.ClientScripts.BootstrapClientScriptHelper.ModalScriptResourceMappingName
member.summary: Script Resource Definition name for WebUIValidationExtension.js.

member.name: M:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.ClientScripts.BootstrapClientScriptHelper.RegisterScriptResourceMappings
member.summary: Register script map resource mapping for "bootstrap", "toastr" and other system names. Bootstrap script are ~/Scripts/bootstrap.min.js, for debug ~/Scripts/bootstrap.js. Toastr script are ~/Scripts/toastr.min.js, for debug ~/Scripts/toastr.js. Method called at application startup by PreApplicationStartMethod attribute in StartUp.cs.

member.name: M:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.ClientScripts.BootstrapClientScriptHelper.RegisterBootstrapClientScript(System.Web.UI.Page)
member.summary: Register Bootstrap Client Script to the page. Uses ScriptResourceMapping. Ensures registration of "jquery".

member.name: T:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.WebControls.Button
member.summary: Button rendered as <button type=&button& ... </button> instead of <input type=&button|submit& ... />. Supports also child controls (ASP.NET standard button does not support child controls for Button). When child controls are used, Text property cannot be used. Gives Text property support of localization.

member.name: M:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.WebControls.Button.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Checks if there is not both Text property and child control used at one time.

member.name: M:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.WebControls.Button.RenderContents(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)
member.summary: Add support for child control rendering, text rendering and span with IconCssClass rendering.

member.name: P:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.WebControls.Button.IconCssClass
member.summary: Css class for icon. When set Button renders <span class=&IconCssClass&><span /> at the beginning of button element content (before child controls).

member.name: P:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.WebControls.Button.TagKey
member.summary: Esures rendering as button element instead of input element.

member.name: P:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.WebControls.Button.UseSubmitBehavior
member.summary: Ensures rendering type="button" instead of type="submit".

member.summary: Brand template - template for rendering brand section of menu.

member.summary: Url for rendering in brand. If value is empty string, element A for navbar-brand is not rendered. Default value is ~/.

member.summary: Brand template - template for rendering brand section of menu. Usualy is surrounded with element a with navbar-brand class (but not when BrandUrl is an empty string).

member.summary: Indicates whether render caret for submenus. Default false.

member.summary: Css class for menu element. Default value is "navbar navbar-default".

member.summary: Internal storege of Active property value with no logic (Active property has logic for setting ActiveTabPanel on TabContainer.)

member.summary: Registers jquery and toastr scripts and script for displaying error message in toastr when ShowToastr is True. Registers message box (alert) script with error messages when ShowMessageBox is True.

member.summary: Registers script for display validation error on client side page load.

member.name: M:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.RegisterShowToastrScripts
member.summary: Registers script for display validation error on client side page load. Cannot be calculated on client sides because validators with has EnableClientScript set to false are not supported on the client side.

member.name: M:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.GetValidationErrorMessages
member.summary: Returns ErrorMessages for display in validation summary. Only messages of validators with failed validation (IsValid = false) are returned.

member.name: P:Havit.Web.Bootstrap.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowToastr
member.summary: Indicates whether to show error messages in toastr.
